name: Patta Gobi Sabzi (Cabbage Stir fry)
description: Easy Cabbage stir fry with mustard seeds and split lentils. Vegan Indian gluten-free Soy-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon organic canola oil or mustard or sesame oil
1 teaspoon chopped green chili or to taste
1 Tablespoon of split lentils of choice (not whole( urad daal-black gram, chana-bengal gram or toor- pigeon pea))

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add oil and heat at medium.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add oil and heat at medium.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mustard seeds when hot and mix for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mustard seeds when hot and mix for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add asofetida(hing), garlic and chili and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add asofetida(hing), garlic and chili and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the lentils/daals and cook for a minute or so, until the lentils and garlic turn golden. Sometimes I soak the lentils for 5 minutes before adding for a non smoky taste. You can skip the lentils and add half teaspoon of cumin and coriander seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the lentils/daals and cook for a minute or so, until the lentils and garlic turn golden. Sometimes I soak the lentils for 5 minutes before adding for a non smoky taste. You can skip the lentils and add half teaspoon of cumin and coriander seeds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add turmeric powder and cabbage and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add turmeric powder and cabbage and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook covered on low heat for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook covered on low heat for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir, add salt and cook partially covered for 10+ minutes, stirring occassionally, until cooked to your preference(also depends on the size of the chopped cabbage).
recipeInstructions.name: Stir, add salt and cook partially covered for 10+ minutes, stirring occassionally, until cooked to your preference(also depends on the size of the chopped cabbage).

recipeInstructions.text: For variations, add peas, chopped carrots or boiled potato, to the cabbage when you add salt. Or change up the spices, use cumin seeds or fennel or just a little garam masala!
recipeInstructions.name: For variations, add peas, chopped carrots or boiled potato, to the cabbage when you add salt. Or change up the spices, use cumin seeds or fennel or just a little garam masala!

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with fresh cilantro or coconut flakes, as a side with Daal soups and Roti or Naan-Indian flat bread or Rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot topped with fresh cilantro or coconut flakes, as a side with Daal soups and Roti or Naan-Indian flat bread or Rice.

keywords: 30 minute meal, stir fry, vegan main course
